title: Project-Based Learning in Applied Chemistry and Engineering for Sustainable Agriculture

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Chemistry and Agricultural Engineering Knowledge, Experimental Design Methods
context.additional_context: Project-based curriculum where graduate and undergraduate students collaborate to address local agricultural issues.

learning_goals: Understand and apply zeolite-based nutrient recovery technology in experimental design
Analyze field-collected agricultural data to propose fertilizer efficiency improvement strategies
Enhance technical communication skills and critical thinking abilities during project execution

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
